fullplot: Having given permission to male nurse Greg Focker to marry his daughter, ex-CIA man Jack Byrnes and his wife travel to Miami to Greg's parents, who this time around are Mr. and Mrs. Focker, who are as different from them as can be. As asked in the first movie, what sort of people name their son Gaylord M. Focker?
plot: All hell breaks loose when the Byrnes family meets the Focker family for the first time.
title: Meet the Fockers

tomatoes.consensus: Talented cast is wasted as the movie is content with recycling jokes from its predecessor, Meet the Parents.
